name: portworx-miniod
description:
Minio on DC/OS 

Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/services/minio 

It is customizable and not guaranteed to work with every version of Miniod, use at your own risk. 
 Updated: 26 Feb 2020.
preInstallNotes:
Default configuration requires 4 agent nodes each with: 2 CPU | 252 MB MEM | 1 200 MB Disk.

Portworx should be installed on the DC/OS private agents in order to provision portworx volumes for this framework
postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Minio is being installed!

	Issues: support@portworx.com
postUninstallNotes:
DC/OS Minio is being uninstalled.
Please follow the instructions at https://docs.portworx.com/scheduler/mesosphere-dcos/framework_cleanup.html to remove any persistent state if required.
